name: SCARY MOVIE
description:
Scary Movie is for the most part, a linear Twine game based on a fanfiction story based on Scream, the Wes Craven series. Scary Movie currently has 4.3K+ words and has one one Bad Ending written. While the story is mainly  like a straightforward story, there is plans for more choices that impact Dru, our main character's fate. Currently only two chapters are out with the third on coming some time early next year. There is a a content warning for mentions and acts of violence, mentions of sexual assault, and depictions of sex. Oh, and swearing. So, not suitable for those under 21.

All characters are depicted as 18+ or older.

Scary Movie features a black, orphaned teenager named Dru Hill with a complicated back story. When a teen at her high-school is murdered, she finds herself wrapped in the mystery, the arms of even more mysterious boys. Lead her to the real reason people are being murdered in Woodsboro, stay away from the chaos, or throw her into danger's path. It's up to you.
